changes.title: Dark Mode Control
changes.description: Switched from prefers-color-scheme media query to class-based dark mode (.dark class). Dark styles now only apply when a dark class is present on a parent element.

changes.title: Tailwind 3 Build
changes.description: Switched build tooling from Tailwind CSS v4 to v3 for better compatibility and class-based dark mode support.

changes.title: Zero Config Installation
changes.description: Tailwind CSS is no longer required! All styles are now pre-compiled and bundled with the component.

changes.title: Removed Peer Dependency
changes.description: Removed tailwindcss from peerDependencies. Only Vue 3.3+ is required.

changes.title: Self-Contained Styles
changes.description: Component now ships with fully compiled CSS, making it work out of the box in any Vue 3 project.

changes.title: Dark Mode Background
changes.description: Main content area (.stepper__main) now has proper background color in dark mode (bg-white dark:bg-zinc-950).

changes.title: Dark Mode Support
changes.description: Full dark mode support throughout all components. Uses prefers-color-scheme media query (system preference).

changes.title: Step Description
changes.description: Added description field to StepConfig for displaying step descriptions in the default title slot.

changes.title: No CSS Import Required
changes.description: Styles are automatically injected, no need to import a separate CSS file.

changes.title: Step Hover States
changes.description: Fixed hover color on current step - now shows a subtle darker shade instead of conflicting with inactive step hover color.

changes.title: Zero-Config Styling
changes.description: CSS is now automatically injected when importing the component. No separate CSS import required - just import and use!

changes.title: Embedded Styles
changes.description: Styles are now bundled directly into the JavaScript. The separate CSS file is no longer generated.

changes.title: CSS Not Included in Package
changes.description: Fixed issue where CSS styles were not being bundled into the distributed package, causing unstyled components when installed via npm.

changes.title: CSS Export Paths
changes.description: Added multiple CSS import paths for flexibility: '@doderasoftware/vue-stepper/style.css', '@doderasoftware/vue-stepper/dist/style.css', and '@doderasoftware/vue-stepper/dist/vue-stepper.css'.

changes.title: i18n Support
changes.description: Added internationalization to documentation site with English and Romanian language support.

changes.title: Language Switcher
changes.description: Added language switcher component in the sidebar for easy locale switching.

changes.title: npm README
changes.description: Fixed missing README.md in npm package (was not displayed on npmjs.com for v1.0.1).

changes.title: UI Customization Props
changes.description: Added :ui, :mobileHeaderUI, and :optionalNoticeUI props for complete styling control with 50+ customizable keys following BEM naming convention.

changes.title: TypeScript Interfaces
changes.description: Exported StepperUI, MobileHeaderUI, and OptionalNoticeUI interfaces for type-safe customization.

changes.title: Component Renaming
changes.description: Renamed MultiStepStepper to Stepper and MultiStepMobileHeader to StepperMobileHeader for simpler imports.

changes.title: Backward Compatibility
changes.description: Legacy component names (MultiStepStepper, MultiStepMobileHeader) are still exported as aliases.

changes.title: Documentation Site
changes.description: Added comprehensive documentation at vue-stepper.doderasoft.com with live demo, API reference, and UI customization guide.

changes.title: SEO & AI Discoverability
changes.description: Added structured metadata, sitemap, robots.txt, and llms.txt for better search engine and AI assistant discoverability.

changes.title: Stepper Component
changes.description: Full-featured multi-step wizard component with sidebar navigation, step progression, and validation support.

changes.title: Mobile Responsive
changes.description: Built-in mobile header with dropdown navigation that automatically activates on smaller screens.

changes.title: Optional Steps
changes.description: Support for marking steps as optional with visual indicators and skip functionality.

changes.title: Step Locking
changes.description: Ability to disable specific steps and control navigation flow with canGoNext prop.

changes.title: useMultiStep Composable
changes.description: Extracted composable for building custom stepper UIs with full control over step logic.

changes.title: TypeScript Support
changes.description: Full TypeScript support with exported types for StepConfig and StepChangeEvent.

changes.title: Slot-based Content
changes.description: Flexible slot system with default, header, and title slots for custom content injection.
